body_html: BTW.. I was curious so I looked back to see what versions of TF support compute capability 3.0 and even back in mid-2015 it looks like they were compiling for CC 3.5 and 5.2, no support for 3.0. Looks like you'll need to compile from source if you want to use the GPU. I had to do this for my laptop's 860M and it now runs without issue.

body: BTW.. I was curious so I looked back to see what versions of TF support compute capability 3.0 and even back in mid-2015 it looks like they were compiling for CC 3.5 and 5.2, no support for 3.0.  Looks like you'll need to compile from source if you want to use the GPU.  I had to do this for my laptop's 860M and it now runs without issue.
